channel.title: Summoning pouches+ints (REL)
channel.description:
ok im coming to the end of the summoning releases now (thank god >.< lol), heres all the pouches i can find so far, dont worry i wil release more when ive found them, also this has taken me an extremly long amount of time to do, so a little apriciation would be nice :(, ok heres some in game piccys
PICTURES: [IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/awww.png[/img][IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/aww2.png[/img][IMG]http://i246.photobucket.com/albums/gg113/rs-kombatking/pow.png[/img] (as you can see the ints are perfect ;) )
INT download link: (ALL OF THE INTS ARE IN HERE AS I CANT POST PAST 2000 WORDS >.<! I SAY AGAIN ALL THE INTS ARE HERE! http://www.megaupload.com/?d=1CV21E72
DOWNLOAD LINK: [url=http://uppit.com/v/RP1P1KW0]http://uppit.com/v/RP1P1KW0[/url]
second download link: [url=http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CDG2R6D2]http://www.megaupload.com/?d=CDG2R6D2[/url]
when u click summon on the pouch you WILL NOT equip it, and these are fully converted and gzipped, ready to add, more to be uploaded asap!
Gary

item.title: Summoning pouches+ints (REL)
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

[quote=“wayzey, post:10, topic:280013”][quote author=TabbyKiller link=topic=369558.msg2797395#msg2797395 date=1243154522]

dude you have to type:
add model @@@@
or add models

so it adds the correct models that go with the ints,
did you add the models of the pouches to your client’s models folder?

Oh lolz thats what I forgot todo, and yes I did add it to the models file.

EDIT: okay I did add model, but it still comes up like how it does in the pictures.
so im sure it has something todo with the model I added in the model file.
[/quote]

Are the ints correct… Are you sure you don’t already have models under the model ID’s that the summon pouches are labelled? If so then you’ve overwritten them and screwed those items up.[/quote]

As in the item id? No I cheaked to see if there was anymore of those items, I think its the model in the model file im not to sure.
But ive done everything from putting the model in the file and adding the ints into Class.8, im adding the terror bird the first one on the INTS list.

Read full topic

item.title: Summoning pouches+ints (REL)
item.dc:creator: @wayzey wayzey
item.description:
@wayzey wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:9, topic:280013”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=369558.msg2797319#msg2797319 date=1243145141]
dude you have to type:
add model @@@@
or add models

so it adds the correct models that go with the ints,
did you add the models of the pouches to your client’s models folder?
[/quote]
Oh lolz thats what I forgot todo, and yes I did add it to the models file.

EDIT: okay I did add model, but it still comes up like how it does in the pictures.
so im sure it has something todo with the model I added in the model file.[/quote]

Are the ints correct… Are you sure you don’t already have models under the model ID’s that the summon pouches are labelled? If so then you’ve overwritten them and screwed those items up.

Read full topic
